name: Force-Underground
description:
A game you can speedrun? A platformer with bosses? Permadeath and different stages everytime you start a game? This game has it all!

Force, parkour, shoot, dodge and switch your way through this game! But before you do that, let me warn you! Once you've entered the Force-Underground, the madness starts! ... Well, at first it (maybe) isn't real madness, but once you meet the Guardian... If you want to give yourself a challenge and if you can handle RAGING, you should give the Force-Underground definitely a visit! You're just one download button away~

This game is 100% made by me (Shakur Bakhtali), except for 2 free assets, which both are fonts.

Enjoy!

My YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxfe97p1m6bHpjD6YfweZJA/

All My Links: https://github.com/SMABVERSE/LINK-SITE/wiki

PS. Feel free to share your visit to the Force-Underground in the comments down below!

This is my first game :D
